pages.text: As of right now, there are three upgrade cards. They are$(br)$(li)The Redstone Upgrade $(li)The Smelter Upgrade $(li)The Speed Upgrade$(br) The Redstone upgrade allows you to toggle the farm on and off using redstone.$(br)The Smelter upgrade will smelt the drops before they are outputted to the buffer. This upgrade is only applicable on farms that have a smelting recipe.$(br) The Speed Upgrade speeds up the drop rate. Currently, this only works on the Fluix Dust Farm from the AE2 integration. If you don't have AE2 installed, you can't use it.

pages.title: Speed Upgrade
pages.text: Can currently only be used with the Fluix Dust Farm from the AE2 Integration. Will not work if you don't have AE2 installed
You put the Upgrade cards on the Farms but combining them in the crafting table with a few other ingredients based on the card.
